questions.question: What is the dominant color of the phone case's exterior?
What appears to be the primary material of the phone case?
What is the overall shape of the closed phone case?
Describe the visual texture of the case's outer surface?
Does the case have a visible opening or flap mechanism?
What is the apparent design style of the case, minimalist or ornate?
Considering the case's construction, is it rigid or flexible?
Is there any noticeable branding or logo on the case?
How many layers or sections does the case visually appear to have?
Describe the visible color of the phone screen shown inside?
What is the general appearance of the case's edges or frame?
Does the case seem to provide full phone coverage, or just partial?
Based on the image, how does the case appear to open and close?
Is the surface finish of the case matte or glossy?
Does the image show any visible seams or stitching on the case?
